sentences.en: A voice on the phone announced itself as Mr. Baker.
sentences.cn: 电话里的人说他是贝克先生.

sentences.en: Baker issued his surprise announcement in Paris after two hours of talks.
sentences.cn: 经过两个小时的会谈后,贝克在巴黎发布了他惊人的通告.

sentences.en: Baker suggested the administration wasn't raring for a fight.
sentences.cn: 贝克暗示行政部门并不急于卷入争斗中。

sentences.en: Baker was smoothing out differences with European allies.
sentences.cn: 贝克正在努力消除同欧洲盟国之间的分歧。

sentences.en: Baker's rod is splintered , and Mond's reel is out of fix.
sentences.cn: 贝德的钓竿已经裂了, 而蒙德的绕线已经损坏了.

sentences.en: He will be partnered by Ian Baker, the defending champion.
sentences.cn: 他将和卫冕冠军伊恩·贝克搭档。

sentences.en: I'm just going to the baker's.
It was still Baker's duty to obey.
Mr Baker was speaking off the cuff when he made those suggestions.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生临时提出那些建议。

sentences.en: Mr Baker will return home via Britain and France.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生将取道英国和法国回国。

sentences.en: Mr Baker would take command of the campaign.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生会负责这次运动。

sentences.en: Mr. Baker was smiling and to the point.
sentences.cn: 贝克先生微笑着，说得很中肯。

sentences.en: Nick Faldo was beaten by Peter Baker in a play-off.
sentences.cn: 尼克·福尔多在附加赛中被彼得·贝克击败。

sentences.en: She said Mr Baker's remarks had been ill-advised.
sentences.cn: 她说贝克先生的那番话是欠考虑的。

sentences.en: They're freshly baked. I fetched them from the baker's this morning.
sentences.cn: 它们是刚出炉的。我早上去面包房买回来的。

words.tran_cn: 烘焙，烘烤；一次烘焙的量
烤，烘焙；烧硬，烘干（bake的ing形式）
[食品]面包师；面包工人；（便携式）烘炉

trans.tran_en: someone who bakes bread and cakes, especially in order to sell them in a shop
